attributes.action: Stop people with children being housed in flats especially above ground floor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a first floor flat.Access in and out the property has been difficult because of the stairs.What if there was a fire.I'd have to throw my children out of a tiny window.My children have never had a garden in the 5 years i have been here.We have a communal garden that the neighbours have overtaken with unsafe plant pots etc,but the local council never done anything after all the times i complained.My children were never allowed out there.I have a house now with a garden,after 5 years of waiting,but my children have never had the facilities that most children get.One of my sons now has behavioural problems becuse of the little space in the flat they had to play in.I know of people who are getting housed in a 3 bed house with 1 child!The housing need to sort this problem out.I do not want other people to go through what we and our children have been through.
